specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Perforated Pleated finishing involves placing the fabric between two molds and steaming it to create permanent pleats. This process adds texture and volume to the garment, producing a dynamic silhouette.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Twill Weave > Denim Denim is designed to fade when washed, so be careful. Separate washing is recommended.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Recommended Use Jeans
